What we did Working principles

Ability - Insight #7

Inaccessibility makes things harder for people

We believe...

The framework for how to manage risk in Co-op can be difficult to understand- we should help people live it and apply it without needing to learn it or read it.

Because we've seen and heard...

“The framework is useful to senior people”

“I understand the framework - but then I should - i’m on the steering group”

"I see the framework being focused on reporting upwards - its too complicated if you can't explain it with sock puppets”

“Framework is perceived as being wordy and hard to penetrate”

“I don't look at the framework- its overly detailed without being related to reality i.e. my day to day”

“Framework - I don't think my team need to be aware of it as a whole - just the policies that concern their job”

Only 24% or respondees find the risk framework easy to understand.

Related user needs

View all

User need #1

As a risk expert
I need to be able to help people manage risk in the right way.
So they can improve their chances of success.

User need #10

When I’m managing my risks
I need to be able to work in the most efficient way possible
So that I’m not wasting time on things that don’t add value

User need #13

When I’m managing risk
I need to know that I’m doing the right thing
So that I don’t feel worried or concerned

User need #15

When I’m managing my risks
I need to know what to do and how to do it
So that I can manage the risks in the most appropriate way

User need #16

As a risk colleague
I need to be able to influence decisions that impact me my role and the tools we use.
So that I can ensure they help me work efficiently and effectively.
